    What's on in Brighton Change cinema Show films from all cinemas


    Advance Screenings

    People's choice

    Doctor Who 50th Anniversary: The Day of The Doctor

    148 people want to see the film.


    Andre Rieu: Home for Christmas

    The King of the Waltz's joyful festive concert with exclusive live tour and interactive Q&A.

    About Cineworld Brighton

    Cineworld Brighton is an 8 screen cinema located on the seafont close to Brighton Pier. The complex is served by a free car park and a wide range of restaurants in short proximity.


    Experience the following:

    3D Movies for juniors Subtitled
    Facilities, location & ticket prices
